GameConditionDef.label: gibbonous moon
GameConditionDef.description: During the gibbonous moon, strange and otherworldy gibbons appear to observe humanity for their own enigmatic purposes.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The gibbonous moon is coming to an end.
GameConditionDef.letterText: The heavens have aligned to form a gibbonous moon. At times like these, it's said that moon gibbons can be seen frolicking under the light of the moon.
